headshotImage.longCaption: Andy Flower player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Naimur Rahman run out (Ebrahim/A Flower) 25 (17b 1x4 1x6 28m) SR: 147.05

notes: Zimbabwe's first 100 runs came off 23.1 overs
The 100-run partnership between A Flower and GW Flower came off 118 balls
GW Flower's score of 142 not out is his highest score, and equals Dave Houghton's Zim record of 142
Javed Belim Omar 50 runs off 61 balls
The 50 partnership between Javed and Bashar came off 62 balls, 20 overs
Bangladesh innings: 2x5 ball overs (25th over bowled by DP Viljoen, 46th over bowled by Mutendara)
At 258/8 after 48.2 overs, Bangladesh beat their highest ever ODI score

milestones.description: This is the highest match aggregate (580) involving teams Zimbabwe & Bangladesh in ODIs

stories.title: Flowers power Zimbabwe to 3-0 win over brave Bangladesh
stories.summary: Zimbabwe duly wrapped up their one-day series against Bangladesh with a third consecutive victory, this time at Queens Sports Club in Bulawayo and by 36 runs
